plot: In 1635, the 152 year old Thomas Parr was taken on a journey to meet King Charles I in London. A celebration of his longevity had fatal consequences.
title: The Old, Old, Very Old Man
plot_es: In 1635, the 152 year old Thomas Parr was taken on a journey to meet King Charles I in London. A celebration of his longevity had fatal consequences.
original_name: The Old, Old, Very Old Man
plot_en: In 1635, the 152 year old Thomas Parr was taken on a journey to meet King Charles I in London. A celebration of his longevity had fatal consequences.
